main event: S/Sgt. Willie L. Cole reported seeing a perfectly round silvery object with curved sides while driving near Reno, Nevada, on September 5, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 3,000 to 5,000 feet and traveling at speeds of 500 to 600 MPH,The object seemed to disappear to the west within 2 minutes of first sighting,The sighting was made under clear conditions with unlimited visibility,This report was noted as the fifth of its type made on that day,Reports of this sighting were forwarded to military intelligence channels.
witness description: S/Sgt. Willie L. Cole, his wife, and his sister-in-law
